Welcome to ``dba`` Documentation
==============================================================================

Documentation for ``dba``.


.. _install:

Install
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

``dba`` is released on PyPI, so all you need is:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install dba

To upgrade to latest version:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install --upgrade dba
